body.description: Our Clima Cover was designed to keep your little ones warm in the winter and cool in the summer. It fits snuggly over any Primo Viaggio Convertible car seats. Made with innovative Tencel material that is made up of innovative microfiber, which helps with temperature regulation. The Clima Cover is the perfect accessory to keep your little one cozy and comfortable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Helps Regulate Body Temperature! Our Clima Cover was designed to keep your little ones warm in the winter and cool in the summer. It fits snuggly over any Primo Viaggio Convertible car seats. Made with innovative Tencel material that is made up of innovative microfiber, which helps with temperature regulation. The Clima Cover is the perfect accessory to keep your little one cozy and comfortable. Tencel is the first fiber to be medically tested according to the FKT test method criteria for body compatibility and toxic substances. It is of botanic origin, since it is extracted from raw material wood. The fiber production is made with a closed-loop system, allowing for the purest of materials to be created. Textiles of Tencel are more absorbent than cotton, softer than silk and cooler than linen.

Primo viaggio Convertible Primo viaggio Convertible Kinetic Our Primo Viaggio Convertible Primo Viaggio Convertible - Reversible Car Seat - Rear Facing for Children 5 to 45 lbs and Forward Facing for Children 22 to 65 lbs - Made in Italy Primo Viaggio Convertible Kinetic - Reversible Car Seat - Rear Facing for Children 5 to 45 lbs and Forward Facing for Children 22 to 65 lbs - Made in Italy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love our Peg Perego seat and I love that we ...
reviews.reviewText: I love our Peg Perego seat and I love that we can now cover and protect it with this super soft, easy to wash cover. We are planning to take our carseat to Australia with us again soon and this cover will be coming along too for sure! I believe it definitely makes my child feel cooler too on a hot day and warmer on a chillier one. Just one thing; it doesn't seem to fit super snugly (as it looks like it does in the pic) but that hasn't really bothered me too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must Have for warmer climates!!!
reviews.reviewText: This material is soft, luxurious feeling, and even after an hour in the seat my LO doesn't have any back sweat!!! It fits well, and I love the straps to hold the shoulder harness to the side. Very easy to install. No complaints here other than I wished they offered other colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your hundy!
reviews.reviewText: Loved the product initially but didn’t last one wash, alone, on the cold/gentle cycle and letting air dry. Emailed customer service twice with a promise of a return phone call within two business days. Never received one. So I finally called myself because the chest clip wasn’t snapping in all the way on the car seat either. After waiting she said she would send me a chest clip but that it’s only a 90 day warranty and I would have to send my receipt and pictures and wait for them to review it and yada yada. It has been longer than 90 days. But if you pay 100 bucks for a piece of damn material you would expect customer service to step up after you’ve spent $400 plus on one of their car seats. I even mention that people on amazon were having th same issue & had I read it he reviews beforehand I wouldn’t have purchased. We also have two Peg Perego ride ons and a highchair. After my experience with them I won’t ever buy or recommend any of their products. Just because of the uncaring and basically non existent customer service. Oh & I also I was so upset annoyed with “Maria” that I asked for a manager to call me back and she said ok and verified my info and saodnto expect the call within a few hours. NOTHING. I THINK IM HEADED TO THE BBB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps keep my little one comfortable while he's in the car seat in our tropical ...
reviews.reviewText: Helps keep my little one comfortable while he's in the car seat in our tropical weather climate (no more sweaty, fussy baby). Plus, it helps protect the car seat and is very simple to remove and wash. I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Shape changes after was and velcro scratches the baby
reviews.reviewText: This car seat cover looks nice but I don’t know if it really helps keep the seat cool as it’s very hot here in Texas. Unfortunately my kid got sick so I washed it in cold water and air dried. Even though I was very careful, it still lost some of its original shape. The 2 velcro tabs behind the baby that connect the head piece with the back part of the main cover are stretched and the scratchy part of the velcro is exposed. It has caused scratches on the back of my baby’s arms and is uncomfortable. I would return it but I’m outside of the return window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2014
Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Worth the money!!! Super easy to put on and take off. Will save the car seat from accidents!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2016

reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson & my daughter absolutely loved it!! Have his seat a new look & she says it's soft & comfy with a great fit
Muy practico y util, muy buena calidadny ajusta 👌🏻
